name: education
description:
The education command extracts schools, universities, and libraries from OSM data. Categories include:

- School: primary, secondary, high schools
- Higher: universities, colleges
- Preschool: kindergartens, nurseries, childcare
- Specialized: language, music, driving schools
- Other: libraries, training centres

Includes capacity and operator information.

options.-t, --type: Filter by type: school, university, library, etc.
options.-c, --category: Filter by category: school, higher, preschool, specialized, other
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Education facilities with:
- education_type: Facility type
- name: Institution name
- operator: Operating organization
- isced_level: Education level
- grades: Grade levels served
- capacity: Student capacity
- website, phone: Contact info
